item.title: US Stocks Retreat From Record High With Drag From Nvidia, AMD
item.description: The S&P 500 Index pulled back from an intraday record as declines in Nvidia Corp. and other tech megacaps offset a rally in Broadcom Inc. that had earlier led tech and chip stocks higher.

item.description: The S&P 500 Index pulled back from an intraday record as declines in Nvidia Corp. and other tech megacaps offset a rally in Broadcom Inc. that had earlier led tech and chip stocks higher.
